name: Miniland. Tiny RPG.
description:
You have the honor to become a real warrior and join the battle against evil. But first you need to improve your swordsmanship, earn trust and gain respect.

The game has all the attributes of an RPG game, such as character leveling, quest system, loot system, trade, world events, etc.

The combat system is somewhat non-standard, it is a turn-based battle where you need to catch the timings.

Right mouse to move camera, scroll to zoom. Left mouse to interact. Playtime is approximately 2 hours. You can play on web or download game for Windows.

The game is built on free assets:

  • https://pixelhole.itch.io/pixelholes-overworld-tileset
  • https://dantepixels.itch.io/weapons-asset-16x16
  • https://brullov.itch.io/generic-char-asset
  • https://hitaitaro.itch.io/280-free-rpg-icons-pack-for-rpg-maker-mv-mz
  • https://pudretediablo.itch.io/butterfly
  • https://thkaspar.itch.io/tth-animals, https://thkaspar.itch.io/micro-character-bases
  • https://pimen.itch.io/holy-spell-effect

If you find a bug, please leave a comment.

Have fun.
